title: sri mahagaNapathE
sahitya:
shrI mahAgaNapatE dEhi shivam dayAnidhE



anupallavi



vAmana rUpa alankAra kOmaLatara shubha sharIrA



caraNam



harikEshASTOttara shata vara nAma krti sahAya rAga laya navarasayuta surucira

vAgjarim dEhi paripUrNAnugraha mUrtE parama pAvana ghana kIrtE
